WorkItem.Summary: Is it possible to set raw RichText ?

Comments.Message: At this point in time, no.... IIRC there's already a Work Item for this. It should be possible from either RTF or from HTML, but I haven't written it yet

Hi,

I have a database with Rich Text Format data stored.

I would like to include this data as a column in a report.

So I would use this function too.

Is there any workaround that can be done to set the data in the cell and then change the type to be interpreted as RTF?

Currently the text is interpreted as plain text. So the spreadsheet is produced without error message but the cell shows the rich text format codes.

Thanks

Mr Kim A Groves
If somebody is willing to write a RTF to RichTextRun convertor, but it isn't top of the priority list at the moment
